entry.data:
SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
